def OnCMD_CONTASFINANCEIRASExecute(command, documento): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciBCP command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = documento command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True

def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None: return
widget.View.Commands["CMD_LOG"].Enabled = widget.Entity.Log != None widget.View.Commands["OPERACOESFISCAIS"].Visible = widget.Entity.PermitirLancamentoComplementoOperacoesFiscais()

def OnCMD_EDITARExecute(command, entity): if entity == None: return
entity.TransitoryData["HANDLEDOC"] = entity.Handle #command.TransitoryData["HANDLEDOC"] = entity.Handle
